body.raw:
{
    "measures": [
        "Asset Count",
        "#Contracts",
        "TIV",
        "Gross Exposed Limit",
        "GroundUpLoss",
        "ContractLoss_Value All Types_GL",
        "Net Pre Cat Exposed Limit",
        "Net Pre Cat Loss",
        "Net of Fac Exposed Limit",
        "Net of Fac Loss",
        "Fac Exposed Limit",
        "Fac loss",
        "Treaty Exposed Limit",
        "Treaty Loss"
    ]
}
